Source.Name: python-dns
Source.Description: dnspython provides both high and low level access to DNS. The high level classes perform queries for data of a given name, type, and class, and return an answer set. The low level classes allow direct manipulation of DNS zones, messages, names, and records.

Update.Comment: Rename package, version bump: * Now uses poll() instrad of select() when available. * Added key_id() to the DNSSEC module, which computes the DNSSEC key id of a DNSKEY rdata. * dnspython now raises an exception if HMAC-SHA284 or HMAC-SHA512 are used with a Python older than 2.5.2. (Older Pythons do not compute the correct value.) * Symbolic constants are now available for TSIG algorithm names.
Update.Name: Çağlar Kilimci
